name: joined(_:on:kind:)
desc: Generates a data frame by joining with another data frame type along the columns that you select by identifier for both data frame types.
declaration: func joined<R, T>(_ other: R, on columnIDs: (left: ColumnID<T>, right: ColumnID<T>), kind: JoinKind = .inner) -> DataFrame where R : DataFrameProtocol, T : Hashable
